name: ROLE_FORENSICS_ANALYST
description: Conducts forensic analysis, evidence handling, and detailed log review.

name: ROLE_DASHBOARD_REPORT_AUTHOR
urls: Get list of all available reports
description: Creates and edits dashboards, visualizations, and scheduled reports.

name: ROLE_INTEGRATION_ENGINEER
description: Manages integrations, APIs, collectors, and external system connectors.

name: ROLE_READ_ONLY_USER
description: Can view dashboards, alerts, and reports but cannot modify anything.

name: ROLE_AUDIT_VIEWER
description: Can only view logs and audit trails without making any system changes.

name: ROLE_COMPLIANCE_OFFICER
urls: Get list of all available reports
description: Ensures regulatory compliance, reporting, log retention, and audits.

name: ROLE_INCIDENT_RESPONDER
description: Handles containment, remediation, and incident response actions.

name: ROLE_SECURITY_ANALYST_TIER_3
urls: Get list of all available reports
description: Performs advanced analysis, threat hunting, and complex investigations.

name: ROLE_SECURITY_ANALYST_TIER_2
description: Conducts deeper investigations, correlates events, enriches alerts.

name: ROLE_SECURITY_ANALYST_TIER_1
urls: Get list of all available reports
Get stats of events as per stages
description: Monitors alerts, performs initial triage and basic investigation.

name: ROLE_THREAT_CONTENT_ENGINEER
description: Builds and maintains detection rules, parsers, threat intel logic, and use cases.
